title: New Google Assistant UI and continued conversation is not available (UK, Pixel 4 XL)
content:
I have a one-day-old Pixel 4 XL, and the Assistant is still the old style, along with continued conversation not being available. 
I have checked the following after a chat with a support agent. 

* No third party launcher is installed
* En-UK is the language for Assistant
* Battery saver is off
* No accessibility settings are turned on
* Only one language is selected in Assistant
* Gesture navigation is on

Yet no advertised launch feature
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
